entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog developing early this evening and dissipating after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
